input:
On the desk, you see the following things arranged in a row: a red fidget spinner, a gold plate, a green pencil, and a blue teddy bear. What is the color of the thing furthest from the green thing?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
